articles.description: Michigan on Monday launched the statewide rollout of a voluntary, free coronavirus app that notifies users if they have potentially been in close contact with infected people.
articles.content:
LANSING, Mich. (AP) Michigan on Monday launched the statewide rollout of a voluntary, free coronavirus app that notifies users if they have potentially been in close contact with infected people.

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Want to invest in electric cars? GM could be a better bet than Tesla - CNN
articles.description: It's been a long time since General Motors has been a hot stock for investors. Electric vehicles could turn it into one.
